Sentencas: There still exists a large gap between simulation work and industrial applications in the context of control and optimization of solid-oxide fuel-cell (SOFC) systems.
Titulo: Real-time optimization of an experimental solid-oxide fuel-cell system

Sentencas: In an effort to bridge this gap, this study describes the experimental implementation of steady-state real-time optimization (RTO) to an SOFC system that consists of both hardware and software components.
Titulo: Real-time optimization of an experimental solid-oxide fuel-cell system

Sentencas: The proposed adaptive optimization scheme uses an approximate steady-state model of the fuel-cell system and corrects it appropriately so that it becomes excellent for optimization.
Titulo: Real-time optimization of an experimental solid-oxide fuel-cell system

Sentencas: This way, the plant can be steered efficiently toward optimality, while meeting the varying electric power demand.
Titulo: Real-time optimization of an experimental solid-oxide fuel-cell system

Sentencas: In these experiments, the plant efficiency was increased from 55% to 62% through application of RTO.
Titulo: Real-time optimization of an experimental solid-oxide fuel-cell system

Sentencas: Furthermore, although the SOFC system is characterized by slow thermal dynamics that may take a few hours to settle to steady state, it has been possible to reduce the time necessary to reach the power setpoint from 1 h to about 5 min thanks to the use of transient measurements and a dynamic model.
Titulo: Real-time optimization of an experimental solid-oxide fuel-cell system

Sentencas: This experimental work has shown that it is possible, not only to control the SOFC system at a desired operating point, but also to operate it near optimality despite changes in power demand.
Titulo: Real-time optimization of an experimental solid-oxide fuel-cell system
